pr_title: Delete a lot of unused VCF constants

timeline.message: got rid of unused DS INFO field

timeline.bodyText: I have a branch where I hook this up so it actually works.  It's pretty handy for debugging some types of things.  If you want to delete it now in the case that I never merge that branch, that's fair.
timeline.author: ldgauthier

timeline.bodyText: These would be useful, but there's no code to generate them.  You can delete them, but they're not bad annotations.
timeline.author: ldgauthier

timeline.bodyText: The TandemRepeat annotation will annotate repeat unit length one, right?
timeline.author: ldgauthier

replies.bodyText: Yes, it does, so this is safe.
replies.author: davidbenjamin

timeline.bodyText: Was this from PhaseByTransmission?  Alas, even after the entire duration of Laurent's postdoc, we still never got that code into GATK4.
timeline.author: ldgauthier
